abstract: As part of its advertising theme of “stuff,” the online security company plans to stage Stuff Theater, live from Chicago; actors will bring to life the random thoughts of Facebook users.
snippet: As part of its advertising theme of “stuff,” the online security company plans to stage Stuff Theater, live from Chicago; actors will bring to life the random thoughts of Facebook users.
lead_paragraph: Another advertiser is joining in a popular trend, producing and sponsoring live content that can be watched online.

headline.main: File Under: Huh? Norton Hires Actors to ‘Stage’ Facebook Status Updates
